main event: An unidentified flying object was observed hovering and maneuvering in the sky over Fort McKinley, Ohio on 20 August 1962.
interesting points: The object was described as dimmer than the brightest star, hovering and moving with considerable speed, There were multiple references to the object appearing to ascend, descend, and hover, The observation lasted between 20-30 minutes, The object changed its course numerous times during the sighting, The conclusion speculated the object might be a balloon, though it is categorized as unknown.
sighted object: a solid object dimmer than the brightest star, hovering and maneuvering
witness description: The witness provided high reliability for location and details regarding the sighting.
